descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u][b]The Basic's[/b][/u][/size]

Hi all

This is my 1st mod, so please go gently on me! lol.

There are so many wonderful mod's out there, and many make-overs for dear little Riverwood. However, for one reason or another, I have never been totally comfortable with them. Each persons view is a little different after all.

What I've wanted, since the begnning, is to be able to have a starter home in Riverwood that looked like its always been there. Nothing over the top, no vast crafting area's, just a simple & cozy home.

And so this came about.

Now, it's take a great deal for me to be able to make this as I have sever depression, and more still to try and offer it up ... for that you may thank ( or possibly curse) my two sons!

[size=4][u][b]What You Get[/b][/u][/size]

A smalter by Alvor's work area
A shrine on the dead-end dock
A fully functional home
Something Hidden!

[size=4][u][b]The Details[/b][/u][/size]

A smelter. Why did poor ol' Alvor not have a smelter? I mean, theres a mine up the road ( ok, so it has a few problems now) but are you telling me he has to go to Whiterun to smelt his ore?

The Shrine. A small shrine to Zenithar on the otherwise usless dead-end dock for the hard working folk of Riverwood.

A home. A simple, in-fitting home in Riverwood that you may purchase very early on. This is fully Nav-meshed and follower compatable. You will also get the 'joy' of having random dragons sitting on it to kill the good folk of the village.

Something Hidden. About this I shall say little, other than a true son or daughter of Skyrim should find it with ease.

[size=4][b][u]How To Use[/u][/b][/size]

Download and install with NMM.
To purchase the house, simply click/activate the 'for sale' sign.
[size=4][u][b]
Does this clash with.....[/b][/u][/size]

Probably most things that alter Riverwood in the area's ive used... Those being By Alvors smithy, the dead end dock and behind the Inn ... Try it out and see what does and does not work for you.

[size=4][u][b]Recomended[/b][/u][/size]

I use this home for many, many levels, thanks especially now to Jaxonz positioner here on the nexus, check it out guys.

[size=4][u][b]Thanks[/b][/u][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36756/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D36756&pUp=1.]Thank's very much to Berticuss0001ï»¿ for his resources's & tutorials
[/url]
author: Wolfslair
